easy.name: Aid
easy.description: Choose 3 creatures in range; increase max and current HP by 5

easy.name: Alarm
easy.description: Create a 20' cube that if triggered sends a mental 'ping'.

easy.name: Alter Self
easy.description: Your shapeshift; 'change appearance', 'aquatic form', 'bioweapon'. Bioweapon is a Light weapon

easy.name: Animal Friendship
easy.description: Convince an animal you mean it no harm

easy.name: Animal Messenger
easy.description: Cast on a tiny animal, to send a short verbal message to someone. Flying animals go further than terrestrial.

easy.name: Animate Dead
easy.description: You animate a corpse/skeleton, and control it for 24 hours, after which it goes rogue. For each character level, gain one extra body.

easy.name: Arcane Lock
easy.description: Lock, with a password, a door, chest etc. Much harder to break into.

easy.name: Armor of Agathys
easy.description: Spectral forst force field surrounds you. Gain 5 temporary HP. Melee attakcs against you cause 5 points of cold DMG.

easy.name: Arms of Hadar
easy.description: Tendrils of dark energy project from you to attack your enemies doing 2D6 DMG. Save (STR) does 1/2 dMG

easy.name: Augury
easy.description: Cast gem-inlaid sticks/bones/runes to get an omen about an cource of action you will take inthe next 30 minutes.

easy.name: Aura of Vitality
easy.description: Heals creatures in radius. They gain 2D6 HP

easy.name: Bane
easy.description: Target 3 creatures in range. On success, their ATK is minus 1D6 until the spell ends

easy.name: Barkskin
easy.description: Target skin becomes touch, lke bark. Consider it Medium Armor
